query:
SELECT
                t.id,
                t.amount,
                t.description,
                t.date AS "date_unix!: i64",
                c.name AS "category_name!: String",
                c.id AS "category_id!: i64"
            FROM transactions t
            JOIN categories c ON c.id = t.category_id
            WHERE t.user_id = ?
            ORDER BY t.date DESC, t.id DESC
            LIMIT 1
